recipesJson.name: Tootall's Lemon sugar cookie
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: Remember the lemon sugar cookies with the clear icing on top? Well this is my attempt at just that a LEMON sugar cookie with icing. If you don't have the cream cheese icing that is fine because it is still a great Lemon sugar cookie without it. It tastes good after  settling over night but gets much better with a 7 day steep.

reviews.text: This recipe is top notch! Loving every drip such a great balance of lemon and cookie.
Simply delicious.  Way to go.. and thanks for sharing!
I have a recipe that's scary close to this. Try swapping out the marshmallow for FA Custard and see what you think.
